title: Mafia III Stones Unturned-CODEX RePack
description:
Title: Mafia III: Stones Unturned
Genre: Sexual Content, Nudity, Violent, Gore, Action, Adventure
Developer: Hangar 13
Publisher: 2K
Release Date: 30 May, 2017

RePack Info:

Most of the cut-scenes removed, strong compression using precomp, srep and arc.
Decompression should take ~20min on a decent machine.

Installation:

1. Mount the .ISO image using daemon tools or unpack it using winrar.
2. Install the game like every other.
3. Crack from CODEX is already in place.
4. Enjoy & Seed ;)
